title: The Curse Of King Tut´s Tomb

sources.title: The Curse Of King Tut´s Tomb
sources.description: Thousands of years ago, the great Child King Tutankhamen ruled. Few know the details of his life no one knows the secrets of his death. But all is about to change. In 1922 Cairo, free-spirited archaeologist Danny Fremont is certain that if found, King Tut's Emerald Tablet would hold the ultimate power to control the world.
